entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 a.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 10:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: S 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
